posts.message: Hey geeks, we're launching a new product "elmenus groups", mainly a real-time updated shared basket (using sockets) that we've been hard at work on, that we'd like to get your feedback on. If interested, you can send me an email at amir.allam@elmenus.com or DM me to send you access codes as it's still in beta. Check elmenus.com/groups for a full description.
posts.caption: elmenus.com
posts.description: The ultimate solution for ordering food in a group at your company. Check your groups order instantly in a shared basket and split your bill easily

posts.message:
Hello Geeks,

I have an application where I use full text search on sql server 2008 R2

The text to be searched is in Arabic.

Everything is fine and FTS is working except that a word with "أ" does not match the same word with "ا".

Is there a default setting in FTS to make these words match or I have to implement it manually ?
